name: Paul Johnston (@pauldjohnston@mastodon.green)
summary:
Listening to Episode 71 of @TheADHDadults 

The "firewood doused in petrol" genetics plus the match of an environmental event is what starts it.

Anecdata but I (ADHD) reckon the pandemic has significantly increase the number of adults getting diagnosed.
